movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief, who enters the subconscious of others to steal valuable secrets, is offered a chance to erase his criminal record if he can perform the most difficult task: implanting an idea into someone's mind.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son in this epic tale of family, power, and betrayal.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family and infiltrates their household by posing as unrelated, highly qualified individuals.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men form a deep bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces off against the Joker, a criminal mastermind who seeks to plunge Gotham City into anarchy and forces the hero to confront the line between heroism and vigilantism.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The story of a man with a low IQ, who unwittingly influences major historical events while remaining blissfully unaware of their significance, all while chasing his childhood love.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in a rebellion against the machines controlling humanity in a simulated reality known as the Matrix.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.description: A young girl becomes trapped in a mysterious and magical world of spirits and gods, where she must work at a bathhouse while seeking a way to rescue her parents and return home.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A Roman general, betrayed and reduced to slavery, rises through the ranks of gladiatorial combat to avenge his family and overthrow the corrupt emperor who murdered them.
